item.title: Rehearsal space available!
item.author: invalid@example.com (alexschaaf)
item.dc:creator: alexschaaf
item.content:encoded: If anyone ever needs a rehearsal space, i have a good spot in my house, with a drumset, PA, amps, etc. Free for any TCUP members, let me know!

item.title: Saffron Dealer need a longterm practice space!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (TransDrummer1312)
item.dc:creator: TransDrummer1312
item.content:encoded:
Hello! I'm posting this here on behalf of Naveen and Dan, we're direly in need of a practice space for us once we come back from hiatus round January-ish. I have two drum sets and I'm between stable housing, which has resulted in me being stuck way out in the suburbs with family, beyond what is reasonable to ask Naveen and Dan to drive out to. I'm on disability and unable to drive as of right now, which makes funds for practice spaces extremely tight on my end, and one of our members already...

Read more
